data.text:
In Ice Cube: N.W.A

…song to rapper Eazy-E and Ruthless Records. The song, originally titled “The Boyz-n-the-Hood,” was passed over by one rap group before being recorded by Eazy-E himself. The result was a major success as both Eazy-E’s first single and as the first collaboration between future N.W.A members Ice Cube, Eazy-E, producer…

Read More

In N.W.A

…Eazy-E began a record label, Ruthless Records, alongside longtime industry man Jerry Heller. Eazy-E then recruited Dr. Dre—who was a member of the group World Class Wreckin’ Cru—and Ice Cube—a member of the rap group C.I.A. (Cru’ in Action!)—to write for the label. At Dr. Dre’s suggestion, Eazy-E agreed to…
